title: Current Research in Complementary & Alternative Medicine
description: Current research in complementary and alternative medicine is a peer reviewed open access journal publishes research papers in advance topics.
cleaned_text: Welcome to Current Research in Complementary & Alternative Medicine Journal, an esteemed platform dedicated to advancing the field of complementary and alternative medicine through rigorous research and scholarly exploration. Our journal serves as a hub for disseminating cutting-edge findings, fostering interdisciplinary discussions, and promoting evidence-based practices in the realm of holistic health and wellness. Mission Statement At Current Research in Complementary & Alternative Medicine, our mission is to bridge the gap between traditional medical practices and innovative holistic approaches. We aim to provide a comprehensive and authoritative source of knowledge that enhances the understanding of complementary and alternative therapies, their mechanisms, and their potential integration with conventional medicine. Our commitment is to support researchers, practitioners, and healthcare professionals in their pursuit of evidence-based solutions for optimizing health outcomes. Scope Our journal encompasses a wide spectrum of topics within the field of complementary and alternative medicine, including but not limited to: - Herbal medicine and botanical therapies - Acupuncture and traditional Chinese medicine - Mind-body interventions, such as meditation and yoga - Energy healing and biofield therapies - Nutritional and dietary interventions - Homeopathy and naturopathy - Integrative medicine approaches - Holistic wellness practices Read More At [Aims and Scope](https://www.gavinpublishers.com/journals/aimsscope/current-research-in-complementary-alternative-medicine-issn-2577-2201) Page Key Features - Peer-Reviewed Excellence: All submissions undergo a rigorous [peer-review process](https://www.gavinpublishers.com/journals/peerreviewprocess/current-research-in-complementary-alternative-medicine-issn-2577-2201)by experts in the field, ensuring the quality and validity of the research published. - Interdisciplinary Exploration: We welcome contributions from diverse disciplines, fostering collaboration and cross-pollination of ideas for a holistic understanding of healthcare. - Evidence-Based Inquiry: Our journal is dedicated to promoting evidence-based research that informs the safe and effective use of complementary and alternative therapies. - Practical Relevance: We encourage research that addresses real-world applications, fostering dialogue between researchers and healthcare practitioners. Editorial Team Our [editorial team](https://www.gavinpublishers.com/journals/boardmembers/current-research-in-complementary-alternative-medicine-issn-2577-2201) comprises distinguished scholars and researchers with extensive expertise in complementary and alternative medicine. Their collective knowledge ensures the high standard and credibility of the research published in our journal. Indexing & Abstracting All published articles are assigned to [Digital Object Identifier](https://doi.org/10.29011/2577-2201) (DOI) - Crossref. All published articles of this journal are included in the indexing and abstracting coverage of: - Genamics - JournalSeek - Academic Keys - ResearchBib - Academic Research Index - Geneva Foundation for Medical Education and Research - International Innovative Journal Impact Factor (IIJIF) - Open J-Gate - Directory of Journals indexing - Index Copernicus - ScienceGate - Publons(PublonsTM profile is moving to the Web of ScienceTM) - WorldCat - Google Scholar - Semantic Scholar - Scilit - ResearchGate - NIH funded articles in the field will be assigned for PubMed inclusion All published articles are permanently [Archived](https://www.gavinpublishers.com/journals/archive/current-research-in-complementary-alternative-medicine-issn-2577-2201) and available at Gavin Publishers website in [HTML and PDF](https://www.gavinpublishers.com/journals/articles/current-research-in-complementary-alternative-medicine-issn-2577-2201) formats. Join the Conversation Current Research in Complementary & Alternative Medicine invites researchers, clinicians, educators, and enthusiasts to contribute their insights and findings to our journal. By [sharing your work](https://www.gavinpublishers.com/journals/submitmanuscriptform/current-research-in-complementary-alternative-medicine-issn-2577-2201), you become part of a vibrant community that drives innovation and advancement in holistic healthcare. Explore our [latest articles](https://www.gavinpublishers.com/journals/recentarticles/current-research-in-complementary-alternative-medicine-issn-2577-2201), engage with our community, and contribute to the evolution of complementary and alternative medicine. Together, let's shape the future of holistic well-being.
